short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Diary for YouTube, stores the current tab's YouTube video by its name which you can later watch by just clicking on it

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"YouTube Diary" is a convenient extension that allows you to create a personalized diary of your favorite YouTube videos. With just a click, it captures and stores the current tab's YouTube video along with its name, enabling you to easily revisit and watch it later.

Whenever you come across an engaging YouTube video that you want to save for future reference, simply click on the extension icon. The video's name will be automatically recorded in your diary. No need to worry about copying links or taking notes anymore.

When you're ready to watch your saved videos, just open the extension's popup and browse through your diary. Each entry displays the name of the video, making it easy to find the one you're looking for. Clicking on an entry will instantly open the video in a new tab, allowing you to enjoy your favorite content without any hassle.

Keep track of your YouTube journey and never miss out on the videos that caught your attention. Install "Youtube Diary" now and create a personalized collection of videos that you can revisit and enjoy at any time.
